title: I'm A Celebrity Extra Camp revamp with Emily Atack and Adam Thomas
text:
I’m A Celebrity Extra Camp has had a makeover (Picture: ITV/Rex)

I’m A Celebrity Extra Camp has undergone a revamp ahead of the new series.

Extra Camp, the sister show of I’m A Celebrity…Get Me Out Of Here!, will return alongside the new series later in the year.

Former presenters Scarlett Moffat and Joe Swash have been replaced by last year’s campmate, actress Emily Atack, and former Emmerdale star Adam Thomas who finished third in 2016.

They will both join returning presenter, comedian Joel Dommett, who came second to Scarlett in the 2016 series. Joel and Emily hosted dating series Singletown earlier this year.

The three straight talking Jungle fanatics will bring their own unique take on the day’s drama live from Australia after each episode airs in the UK.

Fans of Extra Camp can expect to the usual juicy gossip, including unseen clips, exclusive interviews and insider guides to Bushtucker Trials.

Viewers will also get the chance to get involved in lively debates on social media, as well as putting questions directly to campmates live in the studio after they leave the Jungle.

Adam Thomas is stepping into presenting (Picture: ITV)

Emily said: ‘I’m thrilled that I get to make more amazing memories in a place that means so much to me. I’ve loved working with Joel on Singletown, we’re like brother and sister, and Adam has got such amazing energy. The three of us are going to have the best time ever!’

And Adam can’t wait to return to the Jungle three years on from his time in camp.

Joel was joined by Scarlett Moffatt and Joe Swash on last year’s show (Picture: ITV)

No doubt Scarlett will be cheering Emily on (Picture: Instagram)

He said: ‘I can’t believe that I’m heading back to the Jungle, this is something I never saw coming my way! I’m so excited to be reunited with my campmate Joel and to also work alongside Emily. We’re going to have so much fun…just keep me away from those spiders!’

Joel added: ‘So excited to be heading back to the Jungle this year – this time with a new bunch of amigos. I can’t wait to show Emily around and keep reminding Adam that I beat him in 2016. It’s such a huge privilege to do this show and I truly love it. I can’t wait to find out who we are watching!’
